overview: Every man has a fantasy. The Model Behavior Agency fulfills dreams, and fantasies. Few requests are denied. But when Debra starts getting threatening calls, her life is suddenly thrown into chaos as she struggles to protect her girls. Determined to fight back, her nemesis is caught off guard when Debra exacts her own form of sweet revengeâ€¦
tagline: This madam just put her biggest problem six feet under.
title: Model Behavior
